Loop\\_1 contains 12 lines: * line\\_1: [0.0, 0.0] to [0.2812, 0.0] * line\\_2: [0.2812, 0.0] to [0.2812, 0.1875] * line\\_3: [0.2812, 0.1875] to [0.4687, 0.1875] * line\\_4: [0.4687, 0.1875] to [0.4687, 0.0] * line\\_5: [0.4687, 0.0] to [0.75, 0.0] * line\\_6: [0.75, 0.0] to [0.75, 0.75] * line\\_7: [0.75, 0.75] to [0.4687, 0.75] * line\\_8: [0.4687, 0.75] to [0.4687, 0.375] * line\\_9: [0.4687, 0.375] to [0.0937, 0.375] * line\\_10: [0.0937, 0.375] to [0.0937, 0.4687] * line\\_11: [0.0937, 0.4687] to [0.0, 0.4687] * line\\_12: [0.0, 0.4687] to [0.0, 0.0] 4.
